lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.analyzer.mavenasm
Interface MavenDependencyWalker

All Superinterfaces:
ClassWalker
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMavenDependencyWalker
public interface MavenDependencyWalker
extends ClassWalker

This interface is similar to the ClassWalker interface, but on a list of maven dependencies.

Method Summary

          Returns the list of Dependency that is walked
 java.util.List getRemoteRepositories()
          Returns the list of remote repositories where dependencies could be downloaded
